TextLibrary.Text: So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. When I have finished with you, I will place you upon it and you will join my legions.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. When I have finished with you, I will place you upon it and you will join my legions.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. When I have finished with you, I will place you upon it and you will join my legions.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. When I have finished with you, I will place you upon it and you will join my legions.
When I finish you off, Bane, I'll tear it apart piece by piece and cast it into the Sea of Ice.
